extends Object
implements GLComplex

    • Method Detail

      • addInput

        public final boolean addInput(String variableName,
                              int variableLocation,
                              int variableType,
                              int variableComponentCount,
                              boolean normalized)
        Add an input variable for the vertex shader
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name as defined/used in the GLSL vertex shader
        variableType - variable type (GL_GLOAT, GL_DOUBLE, GL_INT, etc...)
        variableComponentCount - number of variable type in the variable (1, 2, 3 or 4) corresponding to (type, vec2, vec3, vec4)
